headline: Amazon Drops Amid Declines Across ‘Mag 7’. What’s Hitting Big Tech Stocks.
summary: Amazon.com  was the one of the steepest decliners among the so-called Magnificent Seven stocks early on Tuesday.  The group of large technology companies were all falling as investors fled perceived riskier assets after President Donald Trump ramped up tariff threats against a number of European countries in his push for U.S. ownership of Greenland.  Amazon was down 2.5% in early trading while chip maker  Nvidia  was falling 3.2%.

Amazon was down 2.5% in early trading while chip maker  Nvidia  was falling 3.2%.

headline: Regula Enables Organizations to Securely Verify Mobile Driver’s Licenses at Scale
summary: RESTON, Va., Jan. 20, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- As digital credentials increasingly replace physical IDs, verification — not issuance — is becoming the critical trust bottleneck. Organizations face a new challenge: how to verify digital IDs securely, consistently, and at scale. Regula, a global developer of identity verification (IDV) solutions and forensic devices, has expanded its Document Reader SDK to support mobile driver’s licenses (mDLs), enabling organizations to verify digital credential

summary: The group of large technology companies were all falling as investors fled perceived riskier assets after President Trump ramped up tariff threats against a number of European countries in his push for U.S. ownership of Greenland.  Amazon was down 3.1% in premarket trading.  The high valuations of technology companies make them vulnerable to sharp drops as investors seek haven assets.
